p: Poliomyelitis (polio) is a viral infection caused by one of three serotypes of polio virus (serotypes 1, 2, and 3) [ 44]. Around 95% of infected individuals are asymptomatic. Symptomatic infections range from a mild illness presenting with fever and diarrhea to paralysis, which occurs in less than 1% of infections.
